a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Children who experience violent discipline, boys vs girls,
Percentage of boys and girls, 2–14 years old, who according to self-reports by caregivers experienced violent
discipline at home in the past month.
Data source: Violent Discipline - UNICEF Global Databases (2016)
